Changelog:
🆕 Updates and Fixes:

3 Fine-Tunes and 1 Bug Fix:

⬇️ Reduced the maximum number of ads per month to 11.

🔑 Now, free users can turn off these ads by activating with any duration key. Kontho will not show the notification or web ad even if the activation is expired.

🎙️ Increased the speech recognition limit in the free version to 1820 characters.

🐛 Fixed the control div disable bug in the word manager in the Pro version.

🛠️ A couple of fine-tunes.
